text: For ependymal cilia the mean CBF was 36 . 3 ± 6 . 4 Hz for the direct counting and 35 . 9 ± 7 . 0 Hz for the ciliaFA method . For respiratory cilia the mean CBF was 11 . 72 ± 2 . 8 Hz for the direct counting and 11 . 97 ± 3 . 0 Hz for the ciliaFA method . The Bland - Altman limits showed agreement from − 2 . 55 to 3 . 25 Hz for the ependymal cilia and showed a closer agreement for the respiratory cilia ( − 1 . 99 to 1 . 49 Hz ) .
